Description:
Brand New Modern sleek Home !!!
**PLEASE CALL FOR PRIVATE INSPECTION**
A blissfully quiet locale provides the ideal setting for this single-level sensation delivering a lifestyle of easy living in the thriving suburb of Clyde North. With immaculate presentation, spacious interiors and an array of upgraded fixtures and fittings throughout, this sophisticated family home is bound to impress anyone who inspect it.
Modern, fresh and light filled interior, a front master bedroom with walk-in wardrobe & ensuite with double vanity, three more bedrooms with built-in robes, a main bathroom, a formal lounge, an open plan expansive living/dining finished with well appointed kitchen which includes 900mm stainless steel five burner cooktop & oven, 40mm stone bench top and walk-in pantry.
Your new home comes with following inclusions
- LED Downlights throughout the house
- Floor boards to hallway, lounge, living, dining and kitchen
- Quality carpets to bedrooms
- 900mm Five burner cook top and oven
- Stone benchtops throughout the house
- 40mm Stone benchtop to kitchen
- Glass splash-back
- Pendant lights to kitchen
- Walk in pantry
- Ducted heating
- Evaporative cooling
- Remote double lockup garage with internal access to house
Your new home is in walking distance to
- future supermarket, medical centre, gym, restaurant and cafes
and Short drive to
- Bunnings on Clyde
- Future Berwick town centre
- Hillcrest College
- Rivercrest Christian College
- Avenue Shopping Centre
- Grayling Primary School
- St Francis Xavier College (Berwick Campus)
- Berwick Chase Primary School
- Catherines Catholic Primary School
- Tulliallan Primary School
- Eden Rise Shopping Centre
- M1 Freeway access (Inbound and outbound)
If you're a first home buyer, you may be eligible for the $10,000 FHOG and stamp duty savings
Call Ravi on 0444 522 762 or Dilshan 0402 696 602to schedule a private inspection for you to flow through the house at your own phase with no distractions and feel all this home has to offer.

Description:
PARK FACING... DREAM HOUSE IN IDEAL LOCATION!
CLYDE NORTH, SELANDRA RISE ESTATE: A perfect and much awaited opportunity knocks at the door of the first home buyers, investors, and families out there Ideal location, enviable dwelling and easy on the pocket too!
This beautiful family home facing Hilltop Park, offering exercise equipment and childrens park, has all the features that an ideal modern home must offer . Boasting 4 Spacious bedrooms, including Master with full ensuite and a Walk-in Robe. The other bedrooms are very spacious and have Built in Robes. The two separate living areas in the house are perfect for family time and entertaining with the large stacker doors open out to the alfresco area. Plenty of space for everyone!
The kitchen is sure to impress any chef with Stone benchtop, top quality appliances, ample cabinet storage and microwave space. Easy to clean timber floorboards, remote-controlled double garage with internal access and low maintenance gardens with a large alfresco, great for entertaining and much more.
Min Features of the Property:
- 4 Bedrooms
- Master with Full Ensuite and WIR
- His and Her Vanity to Ensuite
- 2 Living Areas
- His and Her Vanity to Ensuite
- Full Stacker Doors to Alfresco
- Block out Blinds
- Stone Bench Tops
- NBN Connection
- Double Garage Internal Access
- Electric Paneled Door
- Outdoor Entertainment Area
- Heating: Yes
- Cooling: Yes
- Down Lights: Yes
Chattels: All fittings and fixtures as inspected.
Deposit terms: 10% of the purchase price.
Preferred Settlement: 30/45/60 days.
Ideal location of this home gives you access to
- Hilltop Park
- Selandra Rise Shopping Centre
- Casey Fields sporting grounds
- Casey RACE
- Cranbourne Library
- Clyde Shopping Centre
- Cranbourne Park Shopping Centre
- Bus stops
- Multiple Parks (Tennis Courts & Children parks)
- Cranbourne Railway station
- Wilandra Rise Primary School
- St Thomas Apostle Primary School
- St Peter's College
- Selandra Rise Primary School
- Clyde Tennis Club
- Kingswim& YMCA
This property wont last long in the market, So dont miss out this opportunity, Give Hardeep Singh a call on 0406 676 197 today to book an inspection time.

Address: Lot 705/230S Hardys Road Clyde North VIC 3978
Description:
Neatly Positioned
One of a few neatly positioned blocks in this boutique estate that won't last long - with access to public transport such as extensive bus services and walking distance to the proposed Clyde North town centre and train station, plus access to major arterial roads, including the M1 freeway and South Gippsland Highway
Immerse yourself in Clyde Springs, a unique residential development with substantial integrated parklands and conveniently located in one of Melbourne's most rapidly growing areas. Offering an abundance of opportunities for you and your family to create a bright and prosperous future.
Lifestyle
Surrounded by extensive open spaces, waterways, parkland and within close proximity to Casey Fields Sporting Complex, Casey Recreation and Aquatic Centre, Cranbourne Royal Botanic Gardens, Golf Course, Racecourse and Library, and an easy half hour drive to the beach.
Education
Ideally located close to a range of well regarded schools and institutions; Chisholm Institute, Federation University Campus, Hillsmeade Primary, St. Catherine's Catholic Primary, St. Francis Xavier College, Heritage College, Alkira Secondary College, St. Margarets School and Haileybury College.
Shopping
Clyde Springs enjoys an abundance of shopping centres close by, including Centro Cranbourne, Fountain Gate, Cranbourne Park Shopping Centre, Cranbourne Homemaker Centre and Eden Rise Shopping Centre, with a new centre proposed on Hardy Road.
Immerse yourself in Clyde Springs Mountain views, parkland, recycled water for lush green gardens and amazing amenities close by.

- 4 Bedrooms,

- Double robe in the 3 bedrooms.

Description:
MASSIVE LAND GORGEOUS HOME...CENTRAL LOCATION!
CRANBOURNE, Carlisle Park Estate: Get ready to be blown away by this awe-inspiring beauty, located at the most enviable spot! This well-lit family home is big enough to provide private space to each member of the family, while being generous on entertaining space as well. This lovely house surrounded by parks, shopping centres and sports facilities is a great house for a big family.
Set on a massive land block measuring 576 sqm approx.. this gorgeous property boasts 4 great sized bedrooms plus a study. Enjoy family living and formal entertaining at its best with a formal lounge, family living and dining area. This house is perfect for entertaining guests with its gorgeous alfresco area with decking.
Main features of the property:
- 4 Bedrooms Plus A Study
- Master Bedroom (Extra Large, Full Ensuite & WIR)
- 3 Living Areas (Lounge, Family and Dining)
- Massive Alfresco with Decking
- Chef's Kitchen (Stainless steel appliances, 900mm Cooktop, Ample Cabinetry)
- Double Car Garage with Remote
- Established Front & Back Yard
- Feature Walls
- Decorative Lights
- Concrete Wrap
- 2 Rainwater Tank
- 2 Garden Shed
- Solar Panels
- Heating: Yes (Ducted)
- Cooling: Yes (AC)
- Down-Lights: Yes
- Land Size: 576 SQM Approx
- Year Built: 2009
Chattels: All fittings and fixtures as inspected.
Deposit terms: 10% of the purchase price.
Preferred Settlement: 30/60/90/120 days.
Amenities:
- Carlisle Park Primary School
- Courtenay Gardens Primary School
- Parks
- Cranbourne Vikings Sports Centre
- Springhill Shopping Centre
- Thompson Parkway Shopping Centre
- Cranbourne Homemaker Centre
- Childcare Centres
- Medical Centres
- Bus Stop/ Merinda Park Train Station
This amazing house could be your dream buy. Call Hardeep Singh now and book an inspection!

Description:
Perfect Investment- Outstanding Quality & Spacious Living
Quality investment nestled in a peaceful yet paramount location.
Exceptional design of well appointed large living areas filled with brilliant light seamlessly connected to a functional well equipped kitchen of ample space & stainless steal appliances, two pleasantly sized queen bedrooms- master with WIR & semi ensuite incl bath.
Magnificent quality fittings offering luxurious bamboo flooring, ducted heating, split system air conditioning, charming out door private decking area, completely landscaped & spacious court yard with access to single lock up garage.
Located in a secluded, quiet court in the heart of Cranbourne amongst everything at your fingertips, public transport, schools, parks, medical plus shopping facilities. A stones throw away from all necessities.
Please call or email to register your interest today.

Description:
STUNNING HOME WITH BEAUTIFUL BONES
CRANBOURNE CENTRAL - Nestled in a quiet spot in Cranbourne sits 11 Baystone Drive. This property would make a great investment to add to your portfolio or the perfect home to put a bit of love into to make it shine.
From the entry of the home you are greeted with a cheerful, sunny sunken living area which has an abundance of space, ready to be turned into a formal living area or whatever you'd like it to be (it's the perfect opportunity to secure your own pool table finally!).
Continuing on down the hallway, the kitchen overlooks an equally as bright meals area and has the space for a dream kitchen to be made. Featuring a gas cooktop, dishwasher, overhead cupboards and plenty of bench space, there is room for the whole family to get involved in making dinner.
You will find 2 good sized bedrooms in this home. The master features a full length mirrored robe, full ensuite and is amazingly spacious. The additional bedroom is also very well sized and benefits from built in robes.
The property features a laundry room with rear access, spacious main bathroom with a separate shower, spa bath and separate toilet.
Stepping outside you will be greeted with a decked entertainment area, which overlooks the lush green garden. The large block of 661m2 means that there is plenty of room to enjoy, creating a peaceful environment for the family.
The property also features a double car garage with rear access, perfect for if you have any toys which need storing.
Features include:
- Large 661m2 block
- Ducted heating
- Two large living areas with separate dining
- Master with ensuite
- Double car garage with rear access
Located in the Sladen Park Estate, this property benefits from being in the central area of Cranbourne, one of the most established and sought after areas. With a mix of older homes on larger blocks and units. Located within walking distance to all facilities, including the newly renovated Cranbourne Park, a range of restaurants, Cranbourne Secondary College and Cranbourne Train Station. Cranbourne Central provides the perfect combination for any resident.
At Ray White Cranbourne our price indications are based upon probable market value, the likely selling price and vendor expectations. You can view with confidence that vendors will sell within the range with favourable conditions.

Description:
BRAND NEW DOUBLE STOREY
Brand new double storey architect designed 3 bedroom home will impress.
Featuring master bedroom with en-suite and large BIR, the further 2 bedrooms are serviced by a main bathroom. Providing open plan design, deluxe kitchen, ducted heating, alarm system, quality floor coverings, driveway , letter box, clothes line, landscaped gardens and single garage with remote controls, all the hard work will be done for you!
Superbly set in the fast growing suburb of Skye within the Emerald Heights precinct. Close to Eastlink, Carrum Downs plaza shopping Centre, Seaford Beach, Schools, Child Care and Public Transport.
To secure your new home pay 5% full deposit and the remainder on completion, which is due in early 2020.
Ideal for the First Home Buyer, Investor or Downsizer.
Contact Geoff Gaertner or Ian Harris for more information.
Disclaimer - internal images are for impression only and highlight the builders past work on stage 1 of this project.

Description:
Private Inspections Welcome
Family Home on a half an Acre!!
Situated near the water edge in one of Cannons Creek's premium courts, this character-filled residence sits on just under half an acre! And represents an idyllic family lifestyle in this quiet coastal Village. The 4-bedroom, 2-bathroom home is dotted with majestic gum trees and expansive lawn, with plenty of room for the whole family an inspection here is a must.
This quality family home is just perfect for moving right on in and putting your feet up, the modern flair with rustic warmth creates a very relaxing environment only achieved living by the coast.
With Two large living rooms either side of the central kitchen and substantial undercover entertainment area makes this the ideal family home, This exceptional entertainer with a servery window to the kitchen, Merbau decking ensures entertaining is a breeze.
Treetop views, vaulted ceilings, and water glimpses feature in the upstairs bedrooms - both the master suite and a sprawling second bedroom.
The kitchen features stacked stone splashback, feature subway tiling, a walk-in pantry, and premium appliances, including Bosch double ovens and a Bosch gas cooktop.
Special features of the home are
• Modern bathrooms
• Spotted Gum floorboards
• Cast iron water feature
• An open fireplace with wood storage and a wood heater add warmth.
• Ample Attic storage
• Ceiling Fans
• Under stair storage
• Extensive off-street parking
• Split system air-conditioners on both levels
This home is ideally located within walking distance to the water & Pier while only being a short drive to the heart of Somerville, Pearcedale, Cranbourne, and surrounding townships.
Contact your #coastalvillagespecialist Jason Stirling 0411 520 173 for your inspection today!

Description:
Sold for Record Price - Contact Karen on 0490 242 303
This impressive family home positioned on a generous 5 acre allotment, has something for everyone.
With a total of four bedrooms plus study and dual living zones including theatre room and games room, this magnificent home would allow space for growing families or offer endless options for multiple family accommodation. With two coonara heaters and open fire for the cozy nights in, this property will tick many boxes for those looking to upsize or take on a lifestyle property and focus on living, as the hard work has all been done.
With verandas front and back overlooking the acreage to the rear of the home, talk about peace and quiet! Also catering for those who like to tinker or require machinery storage, there are two large sheds on offer, one measuring 30m X 15m and the other measuring 12m X 12m, each providing an excellent opportunity for further storage options along with the double lock up garage and a single high carport that fits a caravan, boat or horse float.
For dog breeders the property has a dog permit for 30 dogs plus kennels and yards.
Settle into the amazing Devon Meadows lifestyle with the Primary School just metres from home and the local Tennis Club and Recreation Oval less than 1.5km from the property the kids and their activities are covered. For mum and dad, Cranbourne is 10 minutes away but, with the proximity of the many freeways to the property, the Melbourne CBD is just 45 minutes (approx.) away.
Call Karen Day on 0490 242 303 for further information.

Description:
Family Home with Views & Versatility
On approximately 400sqm overlooking the picturesque Clyde Wetlands, this modern four bedroom home demands your attention. Located in the Cascades on Clyde Estate, it offers a well-considered floorplan incorporating plenty of family living and entertaining space. Awash with natural light, the ground floor instantly impresses with a formal lounge, separate open-plan living/dining and a fabulous covered alfresco. Each of these areas is expertly serviced by an immaculate kitchen boasting stone bench tops and high quality S/S appliances. All four bedrooms are ideally located upstairs; the master enjoys a twin vanity ensuite, walk-in robe and stunning parkland views, while the remaining bedrooms include built-in robes and share a chic main bathroom with separate WC. Creature comforts are aplenty with ducted heating and evaporative cooling featured throughout. Theres also a full-sized laundry, guest powder room and a remote double garage with convenient internal access. Perfect for a large or growing family, all this is within easy walking distance of Selandra Rise Shopping Centre, bus stops and a fantastic selection of primary and secondary schools.
***PhilipWebb Real Estate Coronavirus Update***
The health of our valued clients and staff is our highest priority. Please note the following changes to our open for inspection processes as we navigate the current Coronavirus (COVID-19) situation.
Inspections are strictly by appointment only. Please register your contact details to arrange a private inspection with the listing agent
Attendees are limited to one agent and one prospective purchaser, who may be accompanied by one other person (either an existing household member or intimate partner) and their children under 18 years old if there are no appropriate alternative care arrangements available
Please maintain safe social distancing of 1.5m from anyone in attendance including PhilipWebb staff
Face masks must be worn at all times
Avoid touching surfaces including fittings and fixtures within the property
Hand sanitiser is provided
We kindly ask that you refrain from attending an inspection if you:
Are experiencing flu-like symptoms
Have tested positive to, or have recently been in contact with someone diagnosed with Coronavirus
Have recently travelled overseas or have been in direct contact with someone who has
Were all in this together and we thank you for your understanding.

Description:
Call Now to Book A Private Inspection!
Nestled away in a highly sought area of Cranbourne North where you can walk to the local shops and schools awaits this nine year old property. Perfectly priced to please your pocket, this low maintenance property offers contemporary living and should not be missed!
This property is brimming with features, including:
• Four bedrooms, three with built in robes
• Master bedroom features a walk in wardrobe and ensuite
• Spacious kitchen with stainless steel appliances incl dishwasher featuring large island bench
• Open plan kitchen overlooks the dining and living area and flows to the backyard
• Ducted heating and a reverse cycle air conditioning unit
• Main bathroom includes bathtub and separate toilet
• Separate laundry with external access
• Solar hot water system reducing bills
• Outdoor entertaining area and spacious low maintenance backyard
• Remote controlled single car garage plus single spot in front
• Currently rented out to a brilliant tenant for $1,521pcm
Situated walking distance to Alkira Secondary College and Tulliallan Primary School as well as the Eve Shopping Centre and The Avenue Shopping Centre. The Monash Freeway is easily accessible and Cranbourne Train Station is a short 9 minute drive away.

Description:
The property that just keeps giving!
The property that just keeps giving! (listed in Stage 4 Covid 19 Restrictions September 2020)
If you're after a property that is surrounded by nature then this is the property for you. Situated on a generous size 1174m2 of land, it has a lot to offer.
Comprising 2 separate dwellings; the main home has 3 bedrooms, central bathroom, open plan kitchen and meals area with floorboards throughout the home. Also featuring Gas cooking and a split system air conditioner to keep you comfortable all year round. The loungeroom leads out to the verandah in which to sit and watch the birdlife that visit the pond.
The second dwelling "Warneet Cottage" a studio style bungalow was operated as a successful bnb. Providing couples comfortable accommodation whilst they enjoyed the quiet surrounds, interrupted only by birdsong whilst they foraged for their dinner in the veggie gardens. Complete with a kitchenette and bathroom it is also perfect for a teenager or guests.
Special features of the property include:
• 2 x 10,000 lt water tanks with pressure pumps for gardens and boat clean down
• 6kw solar system
• Wood fire heater
• Veggie gardens and 12 assorted fruit trees
• Extra high double carport for boats and caravan
• Corner block with 2 driveways
We believe this property would be well suited to first home buyers, investors, retirees or anyone that wants a Coastal Village lifestyle whilst being only a short drive to schools and shopping centres.
This property is ideally located, being walking distance to the Waters edge, General store, Jetty and Yacht Club.
11 Elimatta Street, Warneet will not last long, so contact your #coastalvillagespecialist Jason Stirling on 0411 520 173 to register your interest today.

Description:
Substantial Living in The Hunt Club!
Substantial family living in the prime location of Cranbourne East.
This expansive home proudly sits on an amazing 736m2(approx.) block and will comfortably accomodate a large family.
Positioned in the ever popular Hunt Club Estate only a short distance to Cranbourne East Primary and Secondary schools, Casey Grammar, Hunt Club Village Shopping Centre, public transport and local amenities.
Offering multiple lounge areas and extensive alfresco this home is perfect for entertaining.
The kitchen provides tremendous storage and bench space, gas cooktop, wall oven and dish-draw dishwasher, whilst being the central point of the home connecting the family & meals area. Ideal for family gatherings there is room for everyone with the adjoining rumpus and formal living & dining areas. Not to mention the generous alfresco area will perfectly accomodate all your summer BBQ's.
The master bedroom is privately placed at the front of the property with a spacious double vanity ensuite and walk-in robe.
The further 3 bedrooms situated to the rear of the home include built-in robes, ceiling fans and share the main bathroom and powder room.
Other features include:
- Ducted heating
- Evaporative Cooling
- Laundry with storage and external access
- Tripe car garage plus work/ storage space & rear roller door
- Ceiling fans
- Quality drapes
- Tile and laminate flooring
This home has so much to offer you must see it for yourself!

Description:
BRAND NEW IN BROMPTON ESTATE
Are you searching for stylish low-maintenance living? This modern four-bedroom residence is a real all-rounder. Whether you're a first homebuyer or astute investor, you can't go wrong. Located in the popular Brompton Estate surrounded by endless waterways, park land and walking trails, this exclusive estate is the envy of town!
Be the first to live in this brand-new home with estimated completion date in approximately October 2020 .
Showcasing impressive street appeal, the contemporary façade is instantly appealing with its sleek rendering and attractive brickwork. As you step inside, you'll discover the pristine interior with high ceilings and open-plan layout which flows effortlessly. The spacious living/dining area features tiles, while the adjoining kitchen is sure to be a big hit with quality appliances and plenty of cupboard & bench space. There is a single remote garage with internal access for added convenience and security. The property has a 6.2-star energy rating representing excellent value and all the hard work done, you will be the envy of your friends!
Why Brompton estate in Cranbourne South?
- 11 hectares of Wetlands and Waterways
- More than 15% of the project site is set aside for open space and wetlands (17 hectares)
- On site retail centre with shopping, local services and a supermarket.
- 5 Parks
- 10km of interconnected walking and cycling trails.
****These photos and images are for illustrative purposes only****

Description:
Charming Family Appeal With Endless Possibilities on 600m2
INSPECTIONS BY APPOINTMENT - PLEASE CONTACT AGENT
Found in a convenient cul-de-sac pocket of Cranbourne in the Park Avenue Estate sits this lovely four-bedroom home suited to a range of buyers. Boasting TWO living zones, a brilliant outdoor entertainment area and plenty of extras - this home will definitely surprise and has to be seen to be believed.
Consisting of:
Gorgeous master suite with walk in robe and en-suite.
Three spacious bedrooms all serviced with built in robes
TWO separate living areas to enjoy a formal lounge upon entry and an open plan family room at the rear
Neutral central kitchen including stainless steel appliances, dishwasher, plenty of cupboard and bench space plus an island bench with breakfast bar
HUGE enclosed alfresco - perfect for entertaining all year round plus spacious backyard with plenty of space for kids and pets to play
Double lock up garage with internal access and rear roller door for extra secure parking for a caravan or trailer
Extras include: Ducted heating, split system air-conditioning, coonara fireplace, roller shutters to some windows, downlights throughout, garden shed for storage and MUCH more!
To top it off the location is conveniently central to everything you could ever need! You're only a short walk away from local parks and playgrounds, a quick drive to both Cranbourne and Merinda Park train stations as well as Carlisle Park Primary School. Not far around the corner you will also find Springhill Shopping Centre at your fingertips. Be quick to make this STUNNING home yours and be the envy of your family and friends!
DISCLAIMER: All stated dimensions in the content and photos are approximate only.
***PHOTO ID REQUIRED AT ALL INSPECTIONS***

Address: Lot 733/230S Hardys Road Clyde North VIC 3978
Description:
Located in quiet no-through lane - Clyde Springs
Perfect spot in quite no through lane to build your dream home - Immerse yourself in Clyde Springs, a unique residential development with substantial integrated parklands and conveniently located in one of Melbourne's most rapidly growing areas. Offering an abundance of opportunities for you and your family to create a bright and prosperous future.
Access to public transport such as extensive bus services and walking distance to the proposed Clyde North town centre and train station, plus access to major arterial roads, including the M1 freeway and South Gippsland Highway
Lifestyle
Surrounded by extensive open spaces, waterways, parkland and within close proximity to Casey Fields Sporting Complex, Casey Recreation and Aquatic Centre, Cranbourne Royal Botanic Gardens, Golf Course, Racecourse and Library, and an easy half hour drive to the beach.
Education
Ideally located close to a range of well regarded schools and institutions; Chisholm Institute, Federation University Campus, Hillsmeade Primary, St. Catherine's Catholic Primary, St. Francis Xavier College, Heritage College, Alkira Secondary College, St. Margarets School and Haileybury College.
Shopping
Clyde Springs enjoys an abundance of shopping centres close by, including Centro Cranbourne, Fountain Gate, Cranbourne Park Shopping Centre, Cranbourne Homemaker Centre and Eden Rise Shopping Centre, with a new centre proposed on Hardy Road.
Immerse yourself in Clyde Springs Mountain views, parkland, recycled water for lush green gardens and amazing amenities close by.

Description:
Brand new bordering Berwick Ready to move in!!!
**PLEASE CALL FOR PRIVATE INSPECTION**
An exciting opportunity to secure this wonderful custom designed House that offers comfort and space, Ready to Move in Now!!!
This home with high ceilings offers professionally landscaped front and backyards, four generous bedrooms, master featuring walk in robe and lavish ensuite, remaining three bedroom with wardrobes, separate bathroom and toilet, a formal lounge, spacious open plan living, dining finished with well appointed kitchen fitted with 900mm five burner cooktop, oven and ragehood, dishwasher, stone benchtops and large walk in pantry.
For your convenience, this home comes with
Coloured concrete to driveway
Fencing
Front and back landscaping
Clothesline
Letterbox
LED downlights to living areas
NBN ready
Holland blinds
Tiles to Wet areas, Kitchen, Meals, Living & Pantry & Rear Hallway
Carpet floor coverings to the balance of the home
2590mm ceiling heights
900mm Rangehood & Cooktop Appliances to Kitchen
600mm stainless oven & dishwasher
Remote Control Sectional Garage Door
Flyscreens to all openable windows and flywire to selected doors
Premium 3 coat paint system to walls
Tiled shower bases to Ensuite & Bathroom
Your new home in 2020 is located in short drive to
- Hillcrest College
- Rivercrest Christian schools
- Grayling Primary School (public school)
- Future Berwick Waters Town centre
- Future state primary and secondary school
- Cardinia Creek
- Casey hospital
- Casey central shopping centre
- Eden rise village shopping centre
- Berwick & Beaconsfield railway station
- Monash Freeway Access
- Berwick Chase Primary School.
- Kambrya College
- St Francis Xavier College, Beaconsfield Campus
- Berwick College
Call Dilshan on 0402 696 602 or Madhawa Hewawasam on 0426 659 974 to schedule a private inspection for you to flow through the house at your own phase with no distractions and feel all this home has to offer.
